meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amy Ludwig Mark Rupp Dave Leach Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6284.

td.p: Amy Ludwig, a copywriter from Los Angeles, California
Mark Rupp, a stay-at-home dad from Indianapolis, Indiana
Dave Leach, a software analyst from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 5-day cash winnings total $78,054)

tr.td: QUOTATIONS
EMMY-WINNING TV
I'M JUST TALKIN' ABOUT "SHIFT"
HOW DO YOU...
ARMY STRONG
HIGHLY EDIBLE
